TextView.android:text:
1: How do you calculate threat areas?

We acknowledge threat areas are complex, hence, every type of threat a user can send generates it's own threat area. Something like domestic violence will generate a smaller area than say, stalking.

2: Why should I use this app instead of others with similar features?

There are many apps with features similar to ours but none of them will bring all these features under one roof. Moreover, we offer improved versions of many of these features.

For example, you can share your live location through WhatsApp instead but that is only if you have Internet access. With our app, you can easily do it over SMS.

3. What does the circles size and color represent?

Every circle is different with respect to the category of it's report.

Domestic Violence is Orange
Stalking is Yellow
Harrasment is Red
Sexual Assault is Maroon.
